revision.text: The prices shown in the tables below reflect the base prices of each item. When bought in bulk, items increase in price by various amounts. With the exception of [[File:Masterball.png|25px]][[Masterball|Masterballs]] and [[File:Protein_Item.png|25px]][[Protein]], the price of shop items can be decreased back to their base price by defeating Pok√©mon on routes, [[Gyms]], and [[Dungeons]]. [[Key Items]], [[Oak Item|Oak Items]], and [[Farm Hand|Farm Hands]] are bolded and can only be bought once.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
